abstract: Representative Ann Kirkpatrick, the Arizona Democratic who is challenging Senator John McCain, is offering a prime example of why Republicans should be worried that a Trump nomination would damage the party down the ballot in November.

headline.print_headline: Ad Tars McCain’s Pledge to Support Republican Nominee, Even Trump
headline.main: Ad Tars John McCain’s Pledge to Back the Republican Nominee

snippet: Representative Ann Kirkpatrick, the Arizona Democratic who is challenging Senator John McCain, is offering a prime example of why Republicans should be worried that a Trump nomination would damage the party down the ballot in November.
